/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades showcasing a mix of modern and traditional architecture, reflecting the city's rich history and its march towards the future. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
